texts.name: Ordwald
texts.biography: His father gave him a warrior’s name, but Ordwald rejected the warrior’s arts and turned to magic. He is an old, but powerful, warlock in a land where lords almost never live long enough to grow old.

specialty.description: Casts Slayer with increased effect, based on his level compared to the level of the target unit.
